items.content_html: Open-source anonymous one-to-one chat application inspired by Omegle. It is built with a lightweight Node.js Express and Socket.io backend, offering a seamless real-time chat experience. The project is designed for simplicity, providing users with a platform to connect and chat with strangers anonymously.
items.title: Omkaarr1/Chat_room_using_websocket: Open-source anonymous one-to-one chat application inspired by Omegle. It is built with a lightweight Node.js Express and Socket.io backend, offering a seamless real-time chat experience. The project is designed for simplicity, providing users with a platform to connect and chat with strangers anonymously.
